text: Jurema may refer to: * Jurema, Pernambuco, a municipality in the state of Pernambuco in Brazil * Jurema, Piauí, a municipality in the state of Piauí in the Northeast region of Brazil * Jurema River, a river in Ceará, Brazil * Mimosa tenuiflora, a perennial tree or shrub native to the northeastern region of Brazil
title: Jurema
